imdb.plot outline: Jacob Reese is a cool, calm detective with the MetroCity Police Dept. His partner was killed in the line of fire. Jacob will never work with a partner ever again. That's until his boss assigns him a partner, Eunice Lee. She's a little firecracker ready to kick some ass in the MetroCity's Underworld of crime. Can the two get along? Without killing each other first?
imdb.title: Lawless
plot: Jacob Reese is a cool, calm detective with the MetroCity Police Dept. His partner was killed in the line of fire. Jacob will never work with a partner ever again. That's until his boss assigns him a partner, Eunice Lee. She's a little firecracker ready to kick some ass in the MetroCity's Underworld of crime. Can the two get along?
